task.title: Running the demo build
task.shortdesc: This topic describes how to run the demo build to verify that your copy of the "full easy install" distribution is installed properly.

taskbody.prereq: If you have not done so already, run the "startcmd" script (startcmd.bat or startcmd.sh) to set up a build environment for the DITA-OT.

step.cmd: In the DITA-OT shell, enter the command ant -f build_demo.xml
Type Enter at each prompt to select the default values.
step.info: By default, the demo will build the sample map samples/hierarchy.ditamap to XHTML, and place the output in the out/ directory.

step.cmd: Check the out/ directory to verify that the build generated the expected output files.
